name: Medieval Prison Escape Snake
description:
HOW TO PLAY: WASD to move, step on the red carpet to exit level! its a timer, it takes a few seconds. Best played with sound!

Medieval Prison Escape Snake is a game we made for the GMTK jam 2021. Free Mages, Priests and Warrios from their chains, and bind them to yourself to form an escape-snake of medieval prisoners and make your way to freedom!

We started late, on saturday, and its our second ever jam, but we did our best :) pretty happy with the results ourselfs, learned a lot!

Theres like 6 levels.

have fun, and thanks for visiting our project! 

programmer: basboi / sound & musik: möwe, bobolus / sprites: imogen / still 14 / moabit 21
